snippet: After the Super Bowl, the yoga community did the Internet equivalent of back flips when Seattle won.
abstract: Yoga community takes to the Internet triumphantly following the Seattle Seahawk's Super Bowl victory, claiming that team's dedication to the practice was a decisive factor.
lead_paragraph: After the Super Bowl, the yoga community did the Internet equivalent of back flips when Seattle won.

headline.main: Title for the Seahawks Is a Triumph for the Profile of Yoga
headline.print_headline: Title for the Seahawks Is a Triumph for the Profile of Yoga
